overview: Mr. Olsen is an operations executive with over 20 years of experience in manufacturing, process improvement and quality systems. He holds a Bachelors Degree in Mechanical Engineering from The Catholic University of America. He began his career at Corning, Inc. progressing through Corningâ€™s manufacturing and engineering function on a variety of business start-ups, expansions and turnarounds. Mr. Olsen has held senior positions at M Cubed Technologies, Corvis Corporation and Carr Lowrey Glass Company. He has a track record of building successful manufacturing operations throughout the world.
